trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for the design-time functionality of a Web Forms page and allows access to and manipulation of components and controls that are contained within the Web Forms page at design time.

A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], must provide its own derived version of the WebFormsRootDesigner class to control designers through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> property of the designer.
Control designers use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> property to access and manipulate the containing Web Forms page at design time.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, adds a client script element to the current Web Forms page.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem"></xref> to add to the Web Forms page.
When overridden in a derived class, adds a Web server control to the Web Forms page.
Although a control might already have an ID assigned to it, if there is already a control in the Web Forms page with the same ID, a new ID is assigned.
The control to add to the Web Forms page.
The control relative to which `newControl` is added.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlLocation"></xref> value that indicates the location for `newControl` relative to `referenceControl`.
The ID of the control that was added.
Gets or sets the component that this designer is designing.
The Component property is set by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.Initialize%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
The component managed by the designer.
Returns a design-time <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref> object.

The CreateDesignerActionService method is called by a control designer and provides a way for action items for the control designer to be implemented in the Web Forms page through a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], cast as an <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
A design-time designer action service object.
Returns an <xref href="System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService"></xref> that resolves relative URLs.
An object that resolves relative URLs.
Gets the culture information for the current thread.
The culture information for the current thread.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the URL at which the Web Forms page is located.
The URL at which the Web Forms page is located; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the Web Forms page has no associated URL.
Frees the resources of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner"></xref> object before it is reclaimed by the garbage collector.
Generates empty HTML markup for a control at design time.
The GenerateEmptyDesignTimeHtml method enables a consistent display of empty controls at design time.
The control to generate HTML markup for.
HTML markup for an empty control.
Generates HTML markup that is used to display an error message at design time by using the specified control, exception, and message.
The control that raised the exception.
-or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The exception.
-or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A message to add to the exception message.
-or- An empty string ("").
HTML markup for a control and exception information.
When overridden in a derived class, returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection"></xref> object that contains all client script items that are on the page.
An object that contains all client script items that are on the page.
When overridden in a derived class, returns both the current design-time view and the HTML markup for the specified control.
The control to provide the view and tag for.

When the GetControlViewAndTag method returns, `view` contains an <xref uid="langword_csharp_IControlDesignerView" name="IControlDesignerView" href=""></xref> object that provides access to the visual representation and content of a control at design time.
`view` is passed uninitialized.

When the GetControlViewAndTag method returns, `tag` contains an <xref uid="langword_csharp_IControlDesignerTag" name="IControlDesignerTag" href=""></xref> object that provides access to the HTML element for the control's control designer.
`tag` is passed uninitialized.
Returns the requested service.
The type of service to retrieve.
The requested service; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the service cannot be resolved.
Returns a view object that is determined by the provided <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> obtained from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies*> property.
An object containing the current view of the component.
Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner"></xref> object using the specified component.
The component that this designer is designing.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the designer view is locked.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the designer view is locked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the Web Forms page is still loading.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the Web Forms page is loading; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the designer completes loading the Web Forms page.
To be added.
Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.LoadComplete"></xref> event when the Web Forms page is completely loaded.
An <xref:System.EventArgs>.
Allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of attributes that the designer exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> object.
The attributes for the class of the component.
Allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of events that the designer exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> object.
The events for the class of the component.
Allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of properties that the designer exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> object.
The properties for the class of the component.
Allows a designer to add to the set of attributes that the designer exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> object.
The attributes for the class of the component.
Allows a designer to add items to the set of events that the designer exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> object.
The events for the class of the component.
Allows a designer to add items to the set of properties that the designer exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> object.
The properties for the class of the component.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager"></xref> object that has information about the current Web Forms page.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager"></xref> containing information about the current Web Forms page.
Removes the specified client script from the document at design time.
The identifier for the previously registered client script.
When overridden in a derived class, removes the specified control from the Web Forms page.
The control to remove from the Web Forms page.
Converts a relative URL into a fully qualified URL.
A relative URL for a resource on the site.
A fully qualified URL resolved from relativeUrl.
relativeUrl is .
Sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ID" name="ID" href=""></xref> property of the specified control with the specified string.
The control on which to set the ID.
The string to set as the ID for the control.
Gets an array of technologies that the designer component can support for its display.
An array of supported <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> values.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.DoDefaultAction%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> interface.
Gets or sets the design-time verbs that are supported by the designer.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> interface.
The design-time verbs that are supported by the designer.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter> interface.
The attribute objects for the class of the component.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter> interface.
The event descriptor objects that represent the events of the class of the component.
The keys in the dictionary of events are event names.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PostFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter> interface.
The property descriptor objects that represent the properties of the class of the component.
The keys in the dictionary of properties are property names.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter> interface.
The attribute objects for the class of the component.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter> interface.
The event descriptor objects that represent the events of the class of the component.
The keys in the dictionary of events are event names.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter> interface.
The property descriptor objects that represent the properties of the class of the component.
The keys in the dictionary of properties are property names.
Gets a view object for the specified view technology.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.GetView%28System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
The view technology.
The view object for the specified view technology.
Gets an array of technologies that the designer component can support for its display.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
An array of technologies that the designer component can support for its display.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
Gets the design-time verbs that are supported by the designer.

An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> objects supported by the designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the component has no verbs.
